story.title: The Story
story.subtitle: The enoteca spirit
story.description: La Cave was born from our passion for natural wines. In the spirit of Italian enoteche, we offer a selection of wines to enjoy on site, accompanied by small plates.

wines.title: Wines
wines.subtitle: Our selection
wines.description: Natural, biodynamic and rare wines. Mainly Italian, but also some French gems. Each bottle tells the story of a passionate winemaker.

events.title: Events
events.subtitle: Tastings & special evenings
events.description: Regularly, we organize themed tastings, meetings with winemakers and special evenings.

photos.title: Photos
photos.subtitle: The atmosphere
photos.description: Discover the warm atmosphere of La Cave through our images.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Find us
contact.address: 23 rue de la Fontaine au Roi, 75011 Paris
